001package edu.cnm.deepdive.uno.viewmodel;
002
003import android.content.Context;
004import android.content.SharedPreferences;
005import android.content.res.Resources;
006import android.util.Log;
007import androidx.lifecycle.DefaultLifecycleObserver;
008import androidx.lifecycle.LiveData;
009import androidx.lifecycle.MutableLiveData;
010import androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel;
011import androidx.preference.PreferenceManager;
012import dagger.hilt.android.lifecycle.HiltViewModel;
013import dagger.hilt.android.qualifiers.ApplicationContext;
014import edu.cnm.deepdive.uno.R;
015import edu.cnm.deepdive.uno.model.domain.Card;
016import edu.cnm.deepdive.uno.model.domain.Game;
017import edu.cnm.deepdive.uno.model.domain.Hand;
018import edu.cnm.deepdive.uno.model.domain.User;
019import edu.cnm.deepdive.uno.service.GameService;
020import edu.cnm.deepdive.uno.service.UserRepository;
021import io.reactivex.rxjava3.disposables.CompositeDisposable;
022import java.util.List;
023import javax.inject.Inject;
024
025/**
026 * ViewModel for managing game state and player operations/actions in the Uno application.
027 */
028@HiltViewModel
029public class GameViewModel extends ViewModel implements DefaultLifecycleObserver {
030
031  private static final String TAG = GameViewModel.class.getSimpleName();
032
033  private final GameService gameService;
034  private final UserRepository userRepository;
035  private final MutableLiveData<Game> game;
036  private final MutableLiveData<User> user;
037  private final MutableLiveData<Throwable> throwable;
038  private final CompositeDisposable pending;
039  private final MutableLiveData<Card> selectedCard;
040  private final SharedPreferences prefs;
041  private final String maxPlayerPrefKey;
042  private final int maxPlayerPrefDefault;
043
044  /**
045   * Constructor for GameViewModel.
046   *
047   * @param context        The application context.
048   * @param gameService    The service used to handle game operations.
049   * @param userRepository The repository used for managing user data.
050   */
051  @Inject
052  public GameViewModel(@ApplicationContext Context context, GameService gameService,
053      UserRepository userRepository) {
054    this.userRepository = userRepository;
055    this.gameService = gameService;
056    game = new MutableLiveData<>(null);
057    throwable = new MutableLiveData<>();
058    pending = new CompositeDisposable();
059    user = new MutableLiveData<>(null);
060    selectedCard = new MutableLiveData<>();
061    prefs = PreferenceManager.getDefaultSharedPreferences(context);
062    maxPlayerPrefKey = context.getString(R.string.player_max_pref_key);
063    maxPlayerPrefDefault = context.getResources().getInteger(R.integer.max_player_pref_default);
064    pollForUpdates();
065    userRepository.getCurrentUser()
066        .subscribe(user::postValue);
067  }
068
069  /**
070   * Returns LiveData containing the current Game (state the game is currently in).
071   *
072   * @return LiveData containing the current game.
073   */
074  public LiveData<Game> getGame() {
075    return game;
076  }
077
078  /**
079   * Returns LiveData containing the current logged-in user.
080   *
081   * @return LiveData containing the current logged-in user
082   */
083  public LiveData<User> getUser() {
084    return user;
085  }
086
087  /**
088   * Returns LiveData containing the currently selected card by the user.
089   *
090   * @return LiveData containing the currently selected card by the user.
091   */
092  public LiveData<Card> getSelectedCard() {
093    return selectedCard;
094  }
095
096  /**
097   * Posts the provided {@link Card} object to LiveData.
098   *
099   * @param card the {@link Card} being posted to LiveData.
100   */
101  public void setSelectedCard(Card card) {
102    selectedCard.postValue(card);
103  }
104
105  /**
106   * Creates a new UNO game using min and max player values from setting shared preferences.
107   */
108  public void createGame() {
109    // TODO: 7/30/24 Get the min and max players from settings/preferences
110    int maxPlayer = prefs.getInt(maxPlayerPrefKey, maxPlayerPrefDefault);
111    gameService
112        .createGame(2, maxPlayer)
113        .subscribe(
114            game::postValue,
115            this::postThrowable,
116            pending
117        );
118  }
119
120  /**
121   * Starts an existing UNO game from the server.
122   */
123  public void startGame() {
124    gameService
125        .startGame(game.getValue())
126        .subscribe(
127            game::postValue,
128            this::postThrowable,
129            pending
130        );
131  }
132
133  /**
134   * Submits an UNO move (plays a card) for a player.
135   *
136   * @param card The UNO card being submitted for game play.
137   */
138  public void makeMove(Card card) {
139    Game game = this.game.getValue();
140    gameService.submitMove(game, card)
141        .subscribe(
142            (g) -> {
143              this.game.postValue(g);
144              pollForUpdates();
145            },
146            this::postThrowable,
147            pending
148        );
149  }
150
151  /**
152   * Draws a card for a player.
153   */
154  public void drawCard() {
155    Game game = this.game.getValue();
156    gameService.drawCard(game)
157        .subscribe(
158            (g) -> {
159              this.game.postValue(g);
160              pollForUpdates();
161            },
162            this::postThrowable,
163            pending
164        );
165  }
166
167  /**
168   * Polls the UNO webservice for Game updates.
169   */
170  public void pollForUpdates() {
171    User currentUser = user.getValue();
172    Game currentGame = game.getValue();
173    if (currentUser != null && currentGame != null) {
174      gameService.getGame(currentGame)
175          .subscribe(
176              (g) -> {
177                if (isCurrentPlayersTurn(g, currentUser)) {
178                  game.postValue(g);
179                } else {
180                  if (!currentGame.getLastUpdatedOn().equals(g.getLastUpdatedOn())) {
181                    game.postValue(g);
182                  }
183                  pollForUpdates();
184                }
185              },
186              this::postThrowable,
187              pending
188          );
189    }
190  }
191
192  private boolean isCurrentPlayersTurn(Game g, User currentUser) {
193    boolean isTurn = false;
194    List<Hand> hands = g.getHands();
195    for (Hand hand : hands) {
196      if (hand.getUser().getId().equals(currentUser.getId())) {
197        isTurn = hand.isTurn();
198      }
199    }
200    return isTurn;
201  }
202
203  private void postThrowable(Throwable throwable) {
204    Log.e(TAG, throwable.getMessage(), throwable);
205    this.throwable.postValue(throwable);
206  }
207
208}
